50 namespace moveit_servo
51 {
52 enum CollisionCheckType
53 {
54  K_THRESHOLD_DISTANCE = 1,
55  K_STOP_DISTANCE = 2
56 };
57 
58 class CollisionCheck
59 {
60 public:
66  CollisionCheck(ros::NodeHandle& nh, const moveit_servo::ServoParameters& parameters,
67  const planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitorPtr& planning_scene_monitor);
68 
69  ~CollisionCheck()
70  {
71  timer_.stop();
72  }
73 
75  void start();
76 
78  void setPaused(bool paused);
79 
80 private:
82  void run(const ros::TimerEvent& timer_event);
83 
85  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO getLockedPlanningSceneRO() const;
86 
88  void worstCaseStopTimeCB(const std_msgs::Float64ConstPtr& msg);
89 
90  ros::NodeHandle nh_;
91 
92  // Parameters from yaml
93  const ServoParameters& parameters_;
94 
95  // Pointer to the collision environment
96  planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitorPtr planning_scene_monitor_;
97 
98  // Robot state and collision matrix from planning scene
99  std::shared_ptr<moveit::core::RobotState> current_state_;
100  collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix acm_;
101 
102  // Scale robot velocity according to collision proximity and user-defined thresholds.
103  // I scaled exponentially (cubic power) so velocity drops off quickly after the threshold.
104  // Proximity decreasing --> decelerate
105  CollisionCheckType collision_check_type_;
106  double velocity_scale_ = 1;
107  double self_collision_distance_ = 0;
108  double scene_collision_distance_ = 0;
109  bool collision_detected_ = false;
110  bool paused_ = false;
111 
112  // Variables for stop-distance-based collision checking
113  double current_collision_distance_ = 0;
114  double derivative_of_collision_distance_ = 0;
115  double prev_collision_distance_ = 0;
116  double est_time_to_collision_ = 0;
117  double safety_factor_ = 1000;
118  double worst_case_stop_time_ = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
119 
120  const double self_velocity_scale_coefficient_;
121  const double scene_velocity_scale_coefficient_;
122 
123  // collision request
124  collision_detection::CollisionRequest collision_request_;
125  collision_detection::CollisionResult collision_result_;
126 
127  // ROS
128  ros::Timer timer_;
129  ros::Duration period_;
130  ros::Subscriber joint_state_sub_;
131  ros::Publisher collision_velocity_scale_pub_;
132  ros::Subscriber worst_case_stop_time_sub_;
133 };
134 } // namespace moveit_servo
